title: Lindau released
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415041954im_/http:/typophile.com/files/schild_Lindau_2_T_5126.png)

I admitt, there are more ideas for fonts than time to always elaborate them to a whole family package. Usually, the ideas lay dormant in some hidden file for that reason, having little chance to see the light of the day. But sometimes I want to release the baby for I feel that it would be rather a pitty to ‘keep it imprisoned’. So I decided to [release Lindau now](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415041954/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/andreas-stotzner/lindau/), although it is such a “lonely child”. It may be of some usefulness, anyway.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415041954im_/http:/typophile.com/files/schild_Lindau_5_T_6523.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415041954im_/http:/typophile.com/files/schild_Lindau_4_T_6404.png)
author: Andreas Stötzner

comments.content: Glad you let your baby out, looks very nice!
I saw it on MyFonts last week and I was very impressed. I feel there aren't enough expressive typefaces like these. I genuinely hope you decide to expand Lindau to a proper type family at some point.
thank you fellows. Yes, a complete family would be nice. Time will show if I manage …
